website_summaries.verdict: The overall reaction towards the Nike React Infinity Run has been positive. This neutral running shoe is welcomed because it apparently has a steady in-shoe construction that permits balanced movements on the ground. The shoe delivers a stable ride and an exceptional energy return, both of which contribute to optimum performance. The overall construction also contributes to injury prevention for more comfortable wear.Fans of running shoes that offer steadiness for neutral pronators can enjoy the React Infinity Run.
pros: Several consumers believe that the Nike React Infinity Run offers accommodating steadiness during the run
The underfoot experience is considered speedy and springy without being unwieldy during long runs
Some users have commended the roomy toe box of this Nike running shoe
The upper unit has received positive remarks for welcoming the natural shape and motion of the foot
The general durability of this product is lauded by runners who desire a long-lasting running shoe
According to some testers, the platform is able to stave off knee discomfort and strain on the muscles of the leg
The visual aspect of this product has been deemed agreeable and versatile enough for casual strolls
Most users believe that this model is a lightweight option for all-day use
One trait that people have come to appreciate from the outsole unit of the React Infinity Run Flyknit is the surface grip
cons: A break-in period is needed to fully appreciate a secure yet accommodating in-shoe wrap, based on a couple of reviews
A few people have reported that the forefoot section is a bit restrictive
Some users believe that the heel part of the upper has difficulty locking the heel in place

customer_reviews.title: These Shoes are absolutely PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pair of shoes I have ever owned. Its actually a little difficult to describe how great they feel. If you have had Nike React before, it's a little like that, or maybe even the Nike Joyride... ...but EVEN BETTER! The cushioning system is about as good as you can imagine, the upper isn't too loose or too tight, and the shoes are even designed to give great support and comfort to the heel. Nothing bad to say about these shoes. Try them and see for yourself! I am so happy with them, I have just ordered my second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I feel I'm running in a shoe just as comfortable as a sleeper ahah. I used to run in Pegasus, but got lots of injuries. I'm starting to run again and these are very comfortable! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: julien kibler

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality.
customer_reviews.text: First time buying Nike in over 9 years. I remember why I switched to others brands. Not even a month in and less than 80 miles they are blowing out on the side. Not a shoe For real runners.
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but too much heal slippage for significant exercise/running
customer_reviews.text: No shoe can be perfect for everyone. However Nike is very close. I love this shoe for everyday casual wear. Very comfortable and excellent cushioning similar to the NB 1080v10. The down side, as mentioned by others, is heal slippage. The "sock" upper, with only 4 eyelets, does not allow me to comfortably lock my heal in place. Therefore, the NB is prefered for me.
customer_reviews.author: IA Bond

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I can walk all day and run much longer. I over probate and have flat feet. I was referred to this shoe by a friend. It bounces back with all the foam cushion. I love it. I plan to buy more colors. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bear Coney

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of running but I do a lot of it for the military and do a lot of cross fit. These shoes keep me very stable even when running in a unstable environment. They give me good energy returns when running and feel like clouds. I'm not a brand guy but darn are these some good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: One foot in foot of the other.
customer_reviews.text: The description matches the quality and fit. Great support and feel.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are extremely comfortable, went for a run as soon as I got them to break them in and they feel great. They are on the narrow size though but hopefully with a couple more uses they'll form to my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very comfortable. I had trouble finding them on other websites.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Black

customer_reviews.title: Good for running
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Nike Pegasus as my go to running shoes. Those are amazing for running.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, runs feel a lot better than before I had then. I think they'll hold up good with time too.
customer_reviews.author: John A Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Nike delivers well as always!! Bought this for my son who is so happy with his new running shoes. Fits just right and he says its so comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: EMagno

customer_reviews.title: Please read before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these from Nike. I ran approximately 20 miles in them. First problem is that there is not enough heel padding and not enough eyelets to properly secure your heel. So the shoes slips constantly. Second, is that the shoe is very rigid. I have a flat foot and my foot is very flexible this shoe does not allow for a proper range of motion. Finally the tapered design of the shoe caused sharp pain in my mid foot. I can not recommend this shoe to any serious runner...
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shoes for Real Runners
customer_reviews.text: Run 700+ miles in two pairs of these. Not until around 325-350 that I start having wear and tear issues. At that point they have done their duty. They are comfortable, like running on clouds. Highly recommend. They also assisted in relieving with knee discomfort when running.
customer_reviews.author: stephen roberts

product_meta.title: Nike Men's React Infinity Run Flyknit Shoe
product_meta.description: CONSTANT SUPPORT, ONE KILOMETER AFTER THE OTHER The Nike Epic Pro React Flyknit shoe ensures optimal cushioning with more foam for maximum energy return, miles after mile. The new version of the upper is characterized by precise containment areas that ensure incredible lightness and increased air circulation. The Nike Flyknit upper technology protects the foot, ensuring the stability needed to impact the ground. Soft and lightweight, this shoe allows for better air circulation for the right freshness. The foam at the forefoot and heel provides extra cushioning and softness. The generative midsole design increases durability and allows for a smoother gait. The shape of the foam midsole is specifically designed to support the three stages of gait: flexibility during detachment of the fingers, smooth movement on the full support and cushioning on the contact.
